id: Notion Minimalist Task Manager (Time Sector System)
name: Notion Minimalist Task Manager (Time Sector System)
description: The most effective Task Manager SystemMost productivity systems are quite complex, many involve a lot of hours of setting up and all involve a disproportionate amount of time to maintain. However, the template presented here offers a refreshing alternative that is both straightforward and user-friendly. It draws inspiration from two effective productivity frameworks developed by Carl Pullein: the Collect, Organize & Do (COD) System and the Time Sector System.The COD system is based on the ba
features: Collect:add your tasks to your Inbox; Organize:processing your collected tasks is simple, you only need to decide when you will do a task (this week, next week, this month, next month, etc); Do:see your tasks for the day and take action; Inbox Section:Quickly collect all of your tasks and ideas in one central location.; Fleeting Notes:Jot down any lists or thoughts that come to mind during the day, and access them easily.; Time Sector Index:Effortless switch between different views and visualize your schedule by time sector.; Weekly Planner:Stay on top of your weekly priorities and to-dos, with a planner divided by priority level.; Daily & Weekly Planning Checklists:Keep your task manager clean and organized with these simple checklists, requiring only 10 minutes or less of your time each day.; Areas Section:Categorize your tasks according to different areas of your life, for greater clarity and organization.
